Posts.Content: Hi grandmastar thank you for your kind words, like you I comfort eat , last year I lost my mum to lung cancer & am struggling with joint pains , I have joined a slimming group & excerise class so fingers crossed , the weight will come off , it’s just hard , thank you again xx
Posts.Title: Breast reduction - making me symetrical.

Posts.Content: Hi I to was told to lose weight due to my bmi being 33, I am waiting for reconstruction, I had a mastectomy in dec 2016 the radiotherapy before that 7 sessions of chemotherapy, I am now an Anastrozole , which I believe as made me gain 2 & half stone , I would like any advice on losing weight & tips please. Well done on your weight loss.Â
